register-user: insert into user(username, password, email) values(?,?,?)
get-password-hash-by-username: select password from user where username = ?
set-session-hash: update user set sessionkey = ? where username = ?
remove-session-hash: update user set sessionkey = "" where sessionkey = ?
get-bands-of-user: select band.name from band_member inner join user on band_member.user_id = user.user_id inner join band on band_member.band_id = band.band_id where user.sessionkey = ?
get-band-id-by-name: select band_id from band where name = ?
